member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Security.SinaWeibo.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.SinaWeibo.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.SinaWeibo.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.SinaWeibo.Properties.Resources.Exception_OptionMustBeProvided
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The '{0}' option must be provided..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.SinaWeibo.Properties.Resources.Exception_ValidatorHandlerMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An ICertificateValidator cannot be specified at the same time as an HttpMessageHandler unless it is a WebRequestHandler..
